objects

Class FireTrap

  • java.lang.Object
    • city.cs.engine.Body
      • city.cs.engine.StaticBody
        • objects.FireTrap

  • public class FireTrap
extends city.cs.engine.StaticBody
    Represents a fire trap within the game world. This static body periodically activates, playing a sound effect to indicate its firing state. The sound effect's playback is dependent on the proximity of the player character to the trap.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Detail

      • startFiringSound

        private void startFiringSound()
        Initiates playback of the fire trap's sound effect if the player is within a certain distance. Stops the sound effect if the player moves away beyond this distance. The method is called periodically by a TimerTask.
